sentences.english: Today, the faculty of Fuyong Middle School will hold the 40th anniversary celebration.
sentences.chinese: 今天，福永中學將隆重舉行建校40週年慶祝活動。

sentences.english: 2005 september , d . phone ' s 12th anniversary celebration held in beijing.
sentences.chinese: 2005年9月迪信通十二週年慶典在北京隆重舉行。

sentences.english: This year marks the 60th anniversary of the China-Pakistan relationship.
The emblem was mounted on the Tiananmen Gate on the occasion of the first anniversary of the People’s Republic.
sentences.chinese: 在建國一週年之際，國徽掛上了天安門。

sentences.english: He considered that it was caused by the non-uniformity of the apparent annual motion of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲這是由太陽週年視運動的不均勻引起的。

sentences.english: This commemorative stamp is hereby printed to mark the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the Civil Aviation of China.
sentences.chinese: 爲紀念新中國民航成立60週年，特印刷此紀念郵票。

sentences.english: The Chinese premier also expressed the hope that the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the Sino-Indian diplomatic ties would become a new starting point for the development of the relations.
sentences.chinese: 我希望中印建交60週年成爲雙邊關係發展的新起點。

sentences.english: Biya said Cameroon and China have just celebrated the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties.
sentences.chinese: 比亞表示，喀麥隆和中國剛剛慶祝建交四十週年。

sentences.english: December eighth marked the thirtieth anniversary of John Lennon's death.
sentences.chinese: 十二月十八標誌着約翰列儂逝世三十週年。

sentences.english: My high school is having its twentieth reunion next month.
sentences.chinese: 我的高中母校下個月舉辦二十週年同學會。

sentences.english: A married couple, both 60 years old, were celebrating their 35th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 有一對60歲的夫婦，在慶祝他們結婚35週年。

sentences.english: Today is the 136 anniversary of Andersen , father of fairy tale.
sentences.chinese: 今天是“童話之父”安徒生去世136週年。

sentences.english: Malachite is the anniversary gemstone for the 13th year of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀石是對結婚13年週年的寶石。

sentences.english: This year marks the 30th anniversary of reform and opening-up in China.
sentences.chinese: 今年是中國改革開放30週年。

sentences.english: Aomen has returned China for ten years .
sentences.chinese: 澳門迴歸祖國已經十週年。

definition: anniversary of the founding of a school
to start publishing/to found a journal
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
